languages.text: Протекторат силен, пока он растет. Стабильные, сытые владения неизбежно начинают разрушаться. Присоединив к своей собственности новую планету, Лорд-капитан докажет, что династия фон Валанциус не утратила амбиций и сил.

The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.
languages.original_text: Протекторат силен, пока он растет. Стабильные, сытые владения неизбежно начинают разрушаться. Присоединив к своей собственности новую планету, Лорд-капитан докажет, что династия фон Валанциус не утратила амбиций и сил.

traits.locale_text: The trade empire is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as their property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius hasn't lost any of its ambition and strength.

The trade empire is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as their property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius hasn't lost any of its ambition and strength.

The trade empire is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

The trade empire is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

languages.text: 只要行商浪人的王朝依然在茁壮成长，它就会积蓄力量。而那些安于一隅、不思进取的王朝，则注定会渐渐土崩瓦解。领主舰长需要宣称某颗新的行星归{mf|他|她}所有，以此证明冯·瓦兰修斯家族并没有失去野心与力量。
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: 只要行商浪人的王朝依然在茁壮成长，它就会积蓄力量。而那些安于一隅、不思进取的王朝，则注定会渐渐土崩瓦解。领主舰长需要宣称某颗新的行星归{mf|他|她}所有，以此证明冯·瓦兰修斯家族并没有失去野心与力量。

languages.text: 保護領は発展を続ける限り、その存在を堅牢に保つことができる。安定して満足しきった国家は、必然的に崩壊しはじめる。新たな惑星が自分の所有領であると主張することで、ロード・キャプテンはフォン・ヴァランシウス家は野心や強さを少したりとも失っていないことを証明できるだろう。
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: 保護領は発展を続ける限り、その存在を堅牢に保つことができる。安定して満足しきった国家は、必然的に崩壊しはじめる。新たな惑星が自分の所有領であると主張することで、ロード・キャプテンはフォン・ヴァランシウス家は野心や強さを少したりとも失っていないことを証明できるだろう。

languages.text: El protectorado es fuerte mientras crece. Los dominios estables y satisfechos empiezan a tambalearse tarde o temprano. Al reclamar un nuevo planeta como suyo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán demuestra que la casa von Valancius no ha perdido ni un ápice de su ambición ni su fuerza.
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: El protectorado es fuerte mientras crece. Los dominios estables y satisfechos empiezan a tambalearse tarde o temprano. Al reclamar un nuevo planeta como suyo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán demuestra que la casa von Valancius no ha perdido ni un ápice de su ambición ni su fuerza.

languages.text: Das Protektorat ist stark, solange es wächst. Stabile und saturierte Reiche gehen unweigerlich zugrunde. Durch die Einverleibung eines neuen Planeten hat der Lord Captain bewiesen, dass Haus von Valancius nichts von seinen Ambitionen oder seiner Stärke eingebüßt hat.
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: Das Protektorat ist stark, solange es wächst. Stabile und saturierte Reiche gehen unweigerlich zugrunde. Durch die Einverleibung eines neuen Planeten hat der Lord Captain bewiesen, dass Haus von Valancius nichts von seinen Ambitionen oder seiner Stärke eingebüßt hat.

languages.text: Le protectorat est fort tant qu'il prospère. Les domaines trop stables finissent immanquablement par s'écrouler. En revendiquant une nouvelle planète, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prouvera que la maison von Valancius n'a rien perdu de son ambition ni de sa puissance.
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: Le protectorat est fort tant qu'il prospère. Les domaines trop stables finissent immanquablement par s'écrouler. En revendiquant une nouvelle planète, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prouvera que la maison von Valancius n'a rien perdu de son ambition ni de sa puissance.

languages.text: Protektora büyüyebildiği sürece güçlüdür. Stabil, doymuş diyarlar; kaçınılmaz olarak çökmeye başlar. Lord Kaptan, yeni bir gezegen ele geçirerek von Valancius Hanesi'nin hedeflerinden ve gücünden bir şey kaybetmediğini kanıtlamalı.
languages.original_text: The protectorate is strong as long as it is growing. Stable, sated domains inevitably begin to crumble. By claiming a new planet as {mf|his|her} property, the Lord Captain will prove that House von Valancius has not lost any of its ambition or strength.

traits.locale_text: Protektora büyüyebildiği sürece güçlüdür. Stabil, doymuş diyarlar kaçınılmaz olarak çökmeye başlar. Lord Kaptan yeni bir gezegen ele geçirerek, von Valancius Hanesi'nin hedeflerinden ve gücünden bir şey kaybetmediğini kanıtlamalı.
